title: Livestats URL Address
desc: Base IP address of Livestats server

title: Livestats Polling Interval
desc: How often to ping Livestats server, in seconds

title: Livestats Delay (Manual Mode Only)
desc: Delay livestats data to match observer delay, in milliseconds

title: Livestats Correction Factor (Manual Mode Only)
desc: Correction factor (float) for livestats delay times
